description: System-generated unique identifier for this asset service type record (primary key).
Date-time the record was last created/updated in yyyymmddhhmmssSSS format; used for audit/sync; exact semantics likely 'last modified'—confirm with SME.
Short, user-facing name/description of the asset service type.
Free-text notes providing additional details, caveats, or usage guidance for the service type.
Boolean indicator that the service type is inactive/retired and should not be available for new use.
Identifier of the corresponding record in a legacy system, used for historical mapping and migration; meaning may vary by source—confirm with SME.
Name of the legacy source table that contained the mapped record; retained for lineage and migration traceability; confirm with SME.
